SUMMARY

Applied Machine Learning. Skilled in Computer Vision and Deep Learning, with advanced Python
proficiency and fundamental knowledge of C and C++. Experienced in model training, optimization, and
deployment, alongside data visualization using Power BI,Tableau, etc. Passionate about building real-world
AI solutions with measurable impact. Actively exploring AI agents.
ARUMUGA TAMIL SELVAN M
241 B, Srivilliputhur,Tamil Nadu |  arumugatamilselvan@gmail.com | +91 8072987300 | linkedin | Github
JUNIOR AI ENGINEER

Embedding, Ollama, vLLM

AI Agents & Automation: LangGraph Agents, n8n (No-code AI automation)

Feb 2025 - April 2025AI Intern – RD Labs (Coding Platform)

Other Experiences:

Job_Description:
Job Description: Junior AI Engineer

Position: Junior AI Engineer
Location: [Your Location / Remote / Hybrid]
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role

We are seeking a Junior AI Engineer to join our growing team of innovators. This role is ideal for someone passionate about artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data-driven problem-solving, with a strong desire to learn and contribute to real-world AI projects. As a Junior AI Engineer, you will work closely with senior engineers and data scientists to design, build, and deploy AI-powered solutions that drive impact across our products and services.

Key Responsibilities

Assist in developing and training machine learning models for various applications.

Work with large datasets, including data cleaning, preprocessing, and feature engineering.

Support the deployment and monitoring of AI models in production.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams including product, engineering, and research.

Conduct literature reviews to stay updated on emerging AI/ML techniques and tools.

Participate in code reviews, contribute to documentation, and ensure best practices in reproducible AI workflows.

Provide support in debugging, optimizing, and scaling AI systems.

Qualifications

Required:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or related field (or equivalent practical experience).

Strong knowledge of Python and libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, and Scikit-learn.

Basic understanding of machine learning concepts (supervised/unsupervised learning, neural networks, NLP, or computer vision).

Familiarity with frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.

Knowledge of SQL and experience handling structured/unstructured data.

Good problem-solving skills and eagerness to learn.

Preferred (Nice-to-have):

Internship or project experience in AI/ML applications.

Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) for AI/ML workflows.

Understanding of MLOps tools for model deployment and monitoring.

Contributions to open-source projects, Kaggle competitions, or personal AI projects.

What We Offer

Mentorship and growth opportunities with experienced AI professionals.

Exposure to cutting-edge AI projects across industries.

A collaborative, innovative, and supportive work environment.

Opportunities for professional development and training.

Competitive salary and benefits package.
Good_Points:
*   Extensive hands-on AI/ML project and internship experience.
*   Comprehensive technical skills in Python, ML frameworks, CV, and LLMs.
*   Proven ability to deploy and optimize real-world AI solutions.
Bad_Points:
*   Experience section contains multiple future-dated internships.
*   Lacks explicit mention of cloud platform experience (AWS/GCP/Azure).
*   Includes irrelevant personal awards (e.g., Best Library User).
Recommendations:
Here are 3 very short, actionable improvements for this resume:

*   **Reorder Experience:** Reorganize "Professional Experience & Projects" into strict reverse chronological order (most recent first) for clarity and readability.
*   **Add Cloud Experience:** Explicitly mention any familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) under "Technical Skills" to address the job's preferred qualifications.
*   **Highlight MLOps Tools:** If applicable, list any MLOps-specific tools (e.g., MLflow, Kubeflow, W&B) in "Technical Skills" or within project descriptions to strengthen alignment with preferred qualifications.
Gemini_Comparison: The candidate is an excellent match for the Junior AI Engineer role, demonstrating strong proficiency in Python, key AI/ML frameworks like PyTorch and TensorFlow, and practical experience across Computer Vision, LLMs, and data science. Their extensive internships and projects directly align with the job's core responsibilities, including model development, optimization, and real-time deployment. While explicit mention of major cloud platforms or dedicated MLOps tools is limited, the candidate's proven ability to build and deploy complex AI solutions in diverse settings makes them a highly compelling applicant.
